protein.specific_function: Possesses significant protein thiol-disulfide oxidase activity.

reference.reference_text: Liu F, Rong YP, Zeng LC, Zhang X, Han ZG: Isolation and characterization of a novel human thioredoxin-like gene hTLP19 encoding a secretory protein. Gene. 2003 Oct 2;315:71-8.
